body_html:
Hi @suharshs,

Thanks for the information. I am currently not interested on gaining back the quatnization error through re-training but only to manage to inference through the quantized graph. The model is a style transfer model and I want to quantize both weights and activations as I am showing above.

body:
Hi @suharshs,

Thanks for the information. I am currently not interested on gaining back the quatnization error through re-training but only to manage to inference through the quantized graph. The model is a style transfer model and I want to quantize both weights and activations as I am showing above.
